Setup
```{r}
# Load packages
library(bnlearn)
library(Rgraphviz)
library(psych)
library(lavaan)

# Set data path
DATA_PATH <- paste0(getwd(), "/data/")
LIB_PATH <- paste0(getwd(), "/src/lib/")
PLOT <- paste0(LIB_PATH, "plot_IAMB.R")
```


Turner GLDS-351 (Metaphysis-related variables)
```{r}
main <- paste0(LIB_PATH, "turner_GLDS351_Metaphysis.R")
```

